CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 建议；提议；暗示；表明；使认为；引起；使人想起；使想到；推荐；举荐；使人联想到；启发；暗指；间接提出

synonym.mean: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起

sample.mean: n. 示意动作；手势；动作；表意姿势；姿态；做样子；装门面；故作姿态
v. 咽下；吸收；摄取；吸取

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可建议的；耳根软的；易受影响的
提示地；引起联想地；暗示地
建议；示意；微量，细微的迹象

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指话语、行为或情景中的一种暗示，听者或读者必须加以逻辑推断才能领会。
指通过时间接而有提示性的话语或表情来暗示某事。
指有意或无意的，直接或间接暗示，强调事物的表征等使人引起联想。
多指较正式地提出建议。
多指医生对病人在用药或饮食等方面的建议。
语气较委婉，指提出不成熟的建议或参见意见。
指公开表明对某事或某行为的完全赞同，语气强于recommend。
指向对方提出公开的建议或规劝。
指某一词字面或狭义的意思，或指某些符号或迹象的特指含义。
侧重用文字或符号表示的联想，暗示。
最普通用词。指文字或符号等所表示的各种明确的或含蓄的意义。
通常指暗含地、隐晦地表达意思。
指用文字、说话或表情等表示单纯的意思。

bilingual.source: Of course! I suggest Water City Restaurant.
Think about the changes you would suggest to the head teacher to improve your school.
bilingual.target: 想一想你会建议校长做哪些改变来改善你的学校。

bilingual.source: Explain the threat to this animal and then suggest ideas for saving the animal from extinction.
bilingual.target: 解释这种动物面临的威胁，然后提出拯救这种动物免于灭绝的建议。

bilingual.source: Can you suggest a good restaurant nearby?
bilingual.target: 你能建议一家附近的好餐馆吗？

bilingual.source: I suggest you think better of this decision.
bilingual.target: 我建议你认真考虑这个决定。

bilingual.source: Can you suggest how to improve this plan?
bilingual.target: 你能提出建议如何改进这个计划吗？

bilingual.source: I suggest we take a break and continue later.
bilingual.target: 我建议我们休息一下，稍后继续。

bilingual.source: She always does the contrary of what I suggest.
bilingual.target: 她总是做与我建议相反的事情。

bilingual.source: I suggest you take my advice and don't take risks.
bilingual.target: 我建议你接受意见，不要冒险。

list.abstract: suggest，英语单词，是指建议，提议，暗示等意思，属于动词。
《suggest》是韩国演唱男子组合演唱的一首歌曲，收录于2014年10年13日发行的《Witch》专辑中。

yingyinNormal.en: I suggest that you go back home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我建议你还是回家吧。

yingyinNormal.en: This is very reckless. Well, what would you suggest?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样非常冒险。那您有什么建议？

yingyinNormal.en: Then I suggest you make my alias somebody worth kidnapping.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我建议你给我编造一个值得绑架的身份。

yingyinNormal.en: They have been all along. I suggest you open one up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们一直都在，我建议你打开一个看看。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, then I suggest you trust me for the sake of the cats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我建议你相信我，看在猫的份上。

yingyinNormal.en: I suggest you release whatever you have slowly. One at a time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我建议你们慢慢抖出手上的料。一次一条。

yingyinNormal.en: I have fired up my resume as I suggest that all of you do, as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我把自己的履历烧掉了，我同样建议你们也这样做

yingyinNormal.en: I suggest you open your eyes to the possibility as your father would.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我建议你睁大眼睛看清一切，可能正如你父亲所做。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd suggest that we go away, you and me, on an extended trip to somewhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我建议我们远走高飞，我们随便去哪长期旅行。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, might I suggest watching a little more ESPN and a little less E.?
yingyinNormal.zh: 容我建议你多看一点ESPN体育台，少看一点娱乐节日。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if this experiment is going to be valid, I suggest a neutral environment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果要让这个实验有效，我建议我跟她得住在中立环境。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Honor, may I suggest... That Mr. Fornum be preserved as a rebuttal witness?
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官大人，我建议... 让佛努姆先生作为反驳证人?

yingyinNormal.en: Oblivion's inevitable. And if that scares you, then I suggest you ignore it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 遗忘是不可避免的。如果遗忘让你害怕，那我建议你忽略它。

yingyinNormal.en: They only work for you if you keep your job. I suggest you answer their questions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能保住工作，他们才是你的属下。我建议你回答他们的问题。

yingyinNormal.en: It will. So I suggest you keep the Vorpal sword on hand when the Frabjous Day arrives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会的，我建议，当辉煌之日来临时，你手上要留着斩首剑。

yingyinNormal.en: But, I suggest we don't mention it again. Now, if you'll excuse me, it's time to go down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我建议我们不再提起这事，如果你不介意，我该下去了。

yingyinNormal.en: You have a slight epidermal abrasion on your forearm. I suggest an anti-bacteria spray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的小臂有轻微的上皮组织擦伤，我建议进行除菌喷雾处理。

yingyinNormal.en: And if I may suggest, consider changing disciplines. Yeah, to the humanities perhaps history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且我建议你考虑教别的学科，比如人文学科，就像历史。

yingyinNormal.en: Get your house in order, Bernard. And if there is a problem, I strongly suggest you tell me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 管好你的部门，伯纳德，如果有问题，我强烈建议你告诉我。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe in my twenties, not anymore. Okay. Well, assuming you're right, what would you suggest I do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 二十几岁时可能信过，现在不信了。好吧。假定你说的是对的，你会建议我怎么做？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 建议; 提议; 推荐

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 建议；意见；暗示；提议；联想；细微的迹象；想像；心理暗示

word_family.mean: v. 建议；暗示；引起；使人想到；使人联想到；唤起；委婉地说；想起

sense_info_list.en: to put an idea into somebody's mind; to make somebody think that sth is true

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>suggests</highlight> the possibility that lifestyle factors might help prevent or delay this type of decline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这表明，生活方式因素可能有助于防止或延缓这种衰退。

examination_example.sentence: That <highlight>suggests</highlight> it is in the broader corporate interest to recruit top candidates for increasingly tough jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这表明，为日益艰难的工作招聘顶级候选人符合更广泛的企业利益。

examination_example.sentence: A new study <highlight>suggests</highlight> that contrary to most surveys, people are actually more stressed at home than at work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新的研究表明，与大多数调查相反，人们在家中实际比在工作中更有压力。

sense_info_list.zh: 建议; 提议; 推荐

examination_example.sentence: In order to make the most of our focus and energy, we also need to embrace downtime, or as Newport <highlight>suggests</highlight>, "be lazy".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了充分利用我们的注意力和能量，我们还需要接受停工，或者像Newport建议的那样，"偷懒"。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, one of the apps the students are developing <highlight>suggests</highlight> movies based on your mood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，学生们正在开发的一个应用程序，会根据你的心情推荐电影。

examination_example.sentence: Write a letter of about 100 words to the president of your university, <highlight>suggesting</highlight> how to improve students' physical condition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给你的大学校长写一封100字左右的信，建议如何改善学生的身体状况。

examination_example.sentence: The court did <highlight>suggest</highlight> that accepting favors in return for opening doors is "distasteful" and "nasty."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法院的确表示，收受好处并因此为他人提供便利是“令人反感”且“恶劣的”。

examination_example.sentence: The author <highlight>suggests</highlight> that our perception of children's psychological development was much influenced by the marketing of products for children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者认为，我们对儿童心理发展的认识在很大程度上受到儿童产品营销的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Noam Chomsky <highlight>suggested</highlight> that humans are born with an innate language-acquisition capacity that dictates a universal grammar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 诺姆·乔姆斯基认为，人类与生俱来的语言习得能力决定了通用的语法。

sample.mean: n. 示意动作；手势；动作；表意姿势；姿态；做样子；装门面；故作姿态
v. 咽下；吸收；摄取；吸取

word_usage.usage: suggest一般用作及物动词，其后可接名词、代词、doing的形式或由that/wh-引导的从句。suggest后接that引导的从句，表示“建议；提议”时，从句中的谓语动词要用虚拟语气，即should do的形式，should可以省略；表示“表明，暗示；使想起”时，从句中的谓语动词可用陈述式。
没有suggest to do这种用法。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 建议；意见；暗示；提议；联想；细微的迹象；想像；心理暗示

word_family.mean: v. 建议；暗示；引起；使人想到；使人联想到；唤起；委婉地说；想起

sense_info_list.en: recommend as being worthy of accepting or doing

examination_example.sentence: What does Shulman <highlight>suggest</highlight> scientists do when communicating with the general public?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Shulman建议科学家在与公众沟通时做什么？

examination_example.sentence: They can spot traffic congestion (堵塞) very quickly and <highlight>suggest</highlight> ways round it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以很快发现交通拥堵，并且建议绕行。

examination_example.sentence: We must not elevate discrimination to a science; allowing people to climb the ladder of life only as far as their cells might <highlight>suggest</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们决不能把歧视提高到科学的高度，让人们在生活的阶梯上只能按照他们的细胞可能暗示的那样攀登。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Suggesting</highlight> that lying may have to do with the inability to resist temptation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表明说谎可能与无法抵抗诱惑有关。

examination_example.sentence: A new review of studies <highlight>suggested</highlight> that the carbohydrate can form part of a healthy diet, and even help people lose weight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新的研究表明，碳水化合物是健康饮食的一部分，甚至可以帮助人们减肥。

examination_example.sentence: Students who surfed the web during class did worse on their exams, <highlight>suggesting</highlight> that even the academically smartest students are harmed when they're distracted in class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上课时上网的学生考试成绩更差，这表明即使是学术上最聪明的学生在课堂上分心时也会受到损害。

sense_info_list.en: call to mind through close connection or association

examination_example.sentence: However, if the findings are true, they <highlight>suggest</highlight> that optimism could serve as a psychological trait that promotes health and a longer life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，如果这些发现是真的，它们表明，乐观可以作为一种促进健康和长寿的心理特征。

sample.mean: n. 示意动作；手势；动作；表意姿势；姿态；做样子；装门面；故作姿态
v. 咽下；吸收；摄取；吸取

word_usage.usage:
“建议做某事”用suggest doing sth.表达，suggest后面不能跟不定式。
示例：他建议出去散步。
误 He suggested to go out for a walk.
正 He suggested going out for a walk.

“建议某人做某事”用suggest that sb. (should) do表达，should可省略。
示例：He suggested that the work (should) be finished at once.
他建议工作要马上完成。

suggest作“表明，暗示”解时，其后接的从句时态依据实际情况选择。
示例：她打哈欠表示她很困了。
Her yawn suggests that she is sleepy.

suggest作“推荐, 提议”解时，可接以as短语充当补足语的复合宾语。
示例：She suggested Paris as a good place for the meeting. 
她推荐说，巴黎是举行这次会议的理想地点。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 建议；意见；暗示；提议；联想；细微的迹象；想像；心理暗示

word_family.mean: v. 建议；暗示；引起；使人想到；使人联想到；唤起；委婉地说；想起

sense_info_list.en: recommend as being worthy of accepting or doing

examination_example.sentence: Unless people are prepared to save a lot more, our calculations <highlight>suggest</highlight> that if you are now in your mid-40s, then you are likely to work until your early 70s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非人们准备存更多的钱，否则，据我们计算，如果你现在45岁上下，那么你很可能会工作到70岁出头。

examination_example.sentence: Grenade notices the pre-med macaroni (通心粉) -and-cheese boxes in Scott shopping cart and <highlight>suggests</highlight> she switch to whole grain macaroni and real cheese.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 格林纳德(Grenade)注意到斯科特(Scott)购物车中的通心粉和奶酪盒，并建议她改用全谷物通心粉和真正的奶酪。

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman <highlight>suggest</highlight> doing to learn to speak a foreign language?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女士建议学习说一门外语应该做什么？

examination_example.sentence: A recent blog <highlight>suggested</highlight> maybe people are drinking less milk because it is poisonous to many of us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的一篇博客指出，人们喝牛奶的量减少可能是因为牛奶对我们很多人来说是有毒的。

examination_example.sentence: A goal to balance <highlight>suggests</highlight> that things could quickly get off balance, and that causes terrible outcomes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 平衡的目标意味着事情会很快失去平衡，这会导致非常严重的后果。

examination_example.sentence: What does the author <highlight>suggest</highlight> by saying "The work-life balance is dead"?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者说“工作与生活的平衡已死”，这意味着什么？

sample.mean: n. 示意动作；手势；动作；表意姿势；姿态；做样子；装门面；故作姿态
v. 咽下；吸收；摄取；吸取

word_usage.usage:
“建议某人做某事”用suggest that sb. (should) do表达，should可省略。
示例：He suggested that the work (should) be finished at once.
他建议工作要马上完成。

“建议做某事”用suggest doing sth.表达，suggest后面不能跟不定式。
示例：他建议出去散步。
误 He suggested to go out for a walk.
正 He suggested going out for a walk.

suggest作“表明，暗示”解时，其后接的从句时态依据实际情况选择。
示例：她打哈欠表示她很困了。
Her yawn suggests that she is sleepy.

suggest作“推荐, 提议”解时，可接以as短语充当补足语的复合宾语。
示例：She suggested Paris as a good place for the meeting. 
她推荐说，巴黎是举行这次会议的理想地点。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使人联想起; 使人想起

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 建议；意见；暗示；提议；联想；细微的迹象；想像；心理暗示

word_family.mean: v. 建议；暗示；引起；使人想到；使人联想到；唤起；委婉地说；想起

examination_example.sentence: William Hastie once <highlight>suggested</highlight> that history informs us of past mistakes from which we can learn without repeating them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威廉·黑斯蒂曾经提出，历史告诉我们过去的种种错误，让我们可以从中吸取教训，而不必重蹈覆辙。

examination_example.sentence: Where does the woman <highlight>suggest</highlight> David go for his next holiday?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位女士建议大卫下一个假期去哪里？

examination_example.sentence: To help us prepare for the exam, the teacher <highlight>suggested</highlight> reading through our notes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了帮助我们准备考试，老师建议通读自己的笔记。

examination_example.sentence: Recent research <highlight>suggests</highlight> that if an argument gets resolved, the emotional response tied to it is significantly reduced or almost completely erased.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的研究表明，如果一场争论得到解决，与之相关的情绪反应会显著降低或几乎接近消失。

examination_example.sentence: Last week some city officials <highlight>suggested</highlight> the city might be interested in turning the old theater into a museum and public meeting place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，一些市政官员表示，市政府可能有兴趣把这个旧剧院改造成博物馆和公众集会场所。

examination_example.sentence: Yet there is evidence <highlight>suggesting</highlight> that the trend is growing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，有迹象表明，这一趋势正在加剧。

sense_info_list.zh: 使人联想起; 使人想起

sample.mean: n. 示意动作；手势；动作；表意姿势；姿态；做样子；装门面；故作姿态
v. 咽下；吸收；摄取；吸取

word_usage.usage:
跟从句（从句的谓语动词多由“should+动词原形”构成或用动词原形）：
Mary suggested that they（should）go for a drive.
玛丽建议他们应该开车兜兜风。

跟动名词：
He suggested doing it in a different way.
他建议用另一种方法做。

suggest当“暗示”讲时，从句不用虚拟语气：
His face suggested that he was unhappy.
他的表情暗示他不高兴。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 建议；意见；暗示；提议；联想；细微的迹象；想像；心理暗示

word_family.mean: v. 建议；暗示；引起；使人想到；使人联想到；唤起；委婉地说；想起

sense_info_list.en: recommend as being worthy of accepting or doing

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>suggested</highlight> teaching me to make dumplings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她建议教我包饺子。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>suggest</highlight> trying new things and practicing conversation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们建议尝试新事物，练习对话。

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman <highlight>suggest</highlight> the man do?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女人建议男人做什么？

sense_info_list.en: call to mind through close connection or association

examination_example.sentence: I think there are several reasons that <highlight>suggest</highlight> developing robots is a waste of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为有几个原因表明开发机器人是浪费钱。

examination_example.sentence: But dependency on a network <highlight>suggests</highlight> possibilities of being harmed easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是对网络的依赖意味着很容易受到伤害。

examination_example.sentence: A recent study <highlight>suggests</highlight> that what we are used to doing is not that good.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的一项研究表明，我们习惯做的事情并没有那么正确。

examination_example.sentence: Many pupils <highlight>suggest</highlight> that history is one of the less interesting school subjects
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多学生认为历史是学校里比较无聊的科目之一

sample.mean: n. 示意动作；手势；动作；表意姿势；姿态；做样子；装门面；故作姿态
v. 咽下；吸收；摄取；吸取

word_usage.usage:
“建议做某事”用suggest doing sth.表达，suggest后面不能跟不定式。
示例：他建议出去散步。
误 He suggested to go out for a walk.
正 He suggested going out for a walk.

“建议某人做某事”用suggest that sb. (should) do表达，should可省略。
示例：He suggested that the work (should) be finished at once.
他建议工作要马上完成。

suggest作“表明，暗示”解时，其后接的从句时态依据实际情况选择。
示例：她打哈欠表示她很困了。
Her yawn suggests that she is sleepy.

suggest作“推荐, 提议”解时，可接以as短语充当补足语的复合宾语。
示例：She suggested Paris as a good place for the meeting. 
她推荐说，巴黎是举行这次会议的理想地点。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词。指文字或符号等所表示的各种明确的或含蓄的意义。
通常指暗含地、隐晦地表达意思。
